Author: NightmareXIV, AsunaTsuki
Name: DynamicBridge
Punchline: Allows you to automatically change your appearance based on various conditions.
Description: Automates character appearance changes through rule-based presets, utilizing integration with other popular customization plugins. This enables seamless and context-sensitive transformations, enriching gameplay and increasing immersion.
Changelog:
- Assigned biomes to Dawntrail zones
- Added "City" zone group
- Fixed Penumbra collections assignments
- Added precise time editor

Thanks to Keadgo for contributions!

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: HuntTrainAssistant
Description: Provides useful tools for hunt trains such as: highlighting conductor messages and muting all other chat, auto-opening flags from conductors and auto-teleporting to announced destination.
Changelog:
- Added an option to wait a random amount of time before initiating teleport upon receiving conductor's flag
- A possible issue with create party finder button was fixed (by loonsies)

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: Lifestream
Punchline: A plugin to speed up Aethernet travel and World changing.
Description:
- One click to teleport to any world or aethernet destination
- Click on aetheryte shards inside zone map to teleport to them
Changelog:
New features and improvements:
- Occult Crescent: clicking aetherytes on map to teleport is now supported (when player is next to aethernet shard)
- Residential aetherytes, field operations and firmament shortcuts can now be used in Custom aliases. Additionally, aethernet selection UI was improved. IPC can now pass artificial IDs of these aethernet shards to teleport there as well. 
- Custom aliases now support flight, both native and via vnavmesh
- Renamed custom alias command "Walk to point" to "Move to point"; "Move to point" commands can now be added more easily, and display coordinates while collapsed
- Clicking aethernet shard on a map now will launch teleportation task through main aetheryte (can be disabled in settings, "Only process when next to aetheryte in the same map"
- Clicking aethernet shard when you are already next to that shard will no longer open teleport menu and will instead trigger an error
- Peloton will no longer be used while having Jog effect;additionally, Peloton usage can be disabled separately from Sprint

Bugs fixed:
- Being unable to use housing alias while being not next to aetheryte but in the correct zone
- Being unable to use text commands with "Allow custom alias and house alias to override built-in commands" expert option enabled
- Custom alias aethernet command failing when next to aetheryte in the same zone but not next to correct aetheryte

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: DSR Toolbox
Punchline: A helper plugin for Dragonsong's Reprise (Ultimate).
Description:
Current functions:
Resolve eyes position
Wroth flames automarker (whole group and personal)
Tether to your chain partner

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: WeathermanExtras
Description: Experimental Weatherman functions. Use at your own risk.

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: TextAdvance
Punchline: Quest speedrunning assistance tool. Automatically skips subtitle boxes and confirms cutscene skipping
Changelog:
- Fixed an issue where it was impossible to mount if you had only one mount and it wasn't selected as your preferred mount
- Fixed an error that happened while entity overlay was enabled but Splatoon was not

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: AntiAfkKick
Punchline: A Dalamud plugin for preventing being auto-kicked from FFXIV due to inactivity. Install and forget, no config needed.
Description: A Dalamud plugin for preventing being auto-kicked from FFXIV due to inactivity. Install and forget, no config needed.

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: SelectString
Punchline: Select items in menus via 0-9 keys rather than mouse.

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: Prioritizer
Punchline: Prioritizer sets game's priority to high while crafting.
Description: Prioritizer sets game's priority to high while crafting. No more failed crafts due to random lags while game is minimized.

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: UnloadErrorFuckOff
Punchline: [For plugin developers only] A plugin that clears off load and unload errors.
Description: [For plugin developers only] A plugin that clears off load and unload errors. Plugin development is made easy once again!

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: Imagenation
Punchline: An image drawing backend. To be used together with Triggernometry.
Description: An image drawing backend. To be used together with Triggernometry.

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: ObjectExplorer
Punchline: A convenient way to explore current objects around you.
Description: A convenient way to explore current objects around you. Currently supports players only.

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: Battlevest
Changelog: - Added support for multi-grand-company levemetes and levequests

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: Stylist
Description: Gear manager that will watch your gearset for possible upgrades and upgrade them via single command.
